com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.util

Class CredentialUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.util.CredentialUtils

  • public final class CredentialUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    CredentialUtils retrieves service credentials from the environment.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CredentialUtils.ServiceCredentials
      A util class to easily store service credentials.

    • Method Detail

      • hasBadStartOrEndChar

        public static boolean hasBadStartOrEndChar(java.lang.String credentialValue)
        Returns true if the supplied value begins or ends with curly brackets or quotation marks. Returns false for null inputs.
        Parameters:
        credentialValue - the credential value to check
        Returns:
        true if the value starts or ends with these characters and is therefore invalid

      • getCredentialsFromVcap

        public static CredentialUtils.ServiceCredentials getCredentialsFromVcap(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Calls methods to parse VCAP_SERVICES and retrieve credential values. For some values, if VCAP_SERVICES aren't present, it'll fall back to checking JDNI.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        Returns:
        ServiceCredentials object containing parsed values

      • setServices

        public static void setServices(java.lang.String services)
        Sets the VCAP_SERVICES variable. This is utility variable for testing
        Parameters:
        services - the VCAP_SERVICES

      • setContext

        public static void setContext(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> env)
        Sets the context variable for JDNI. This is a utility method for testing.
        Parameters:
        env - Configuration options for the context

      • getFileCredentials

        public static CredentialUtils.ServiceCredentials getFileCredentials(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Calls methods to find and parse a credential file in various locations.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        Returns:
        ServiceCredentials object containing parsed values
